Hi, I'm Ricky Kuang, a software engineer based in Los Angeles, CA.

I currently work as a Software Developer at Novacoast, Inc., an IT Professional Services and Product Development company. At Novacoast, I am the lead developer on our internal automation projects, a versatile technical consultant out in the field, and August 2020 Developer of the Month!

When I'm not in front of a computer, you'll find me doodling in my sketch pad, practicing bodyweight fitness, or trekking the local hiking trails.
